creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: large tree growing out over a calm stream from R bank; two cows stand in water near L, with a swan near lower center in stream; high, dense foliage lines R shore
inscription: Inscribed in pencil at bottom of sheet, lower left: Samuel Palmer \"The Willow\" L. 1 ii/iii 1850
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; given to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: Signed and dated in the plate, lower left: S Palmer 1850
title: The Willow
